thread.title: BRIEF-Mobileiron Announces Q4 GAAP Loss Per Share $0.08

title: BRIEF-Mobileiron Announces Q4 GAAP Loss Per Share $0.08
text:
Feb 8 (Reuters) - Mobileiron Inc:
* MOBILEIRON ANNOUNCES STRONG FOURTH QUARTER 2017 RESULTS * Q4 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.00 * Q4 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.08 * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 7 PERCENT TO $48.8 MILLION * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $190 MILLION TO $200 MILLION * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE UP 8 TO 13 PERCENT * SEES Q1 2018 REVENUE $42 MILLION TO $45 MILLION * SEES 2018 GROSS BILLINGS BETWEEN $210 MILLION AND $220 MILLION
* SEES Q1 2018 GROSS BILLINGS BETWEEN $45 MILLION AND $48 MILLION
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.03, REVENUE VIEW $46.7 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q1 REVENUE VIEW $44.6 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * FY2018 REVENUE VIEW $186.8 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
